name: Fly High (itch)
description:
FLY HIGH
GMTK 2019 game jam submission

ONLY ONE platform platformer.
Entire game on ONLY ONE screen.

A platformer with only one platform.
As you try to catch the King Fly that has been terrorizing a skyscraper you control a brave constuction worker and the metal beam that supports him. 

Controls:

Keyboard
W/A/S/D controls worker
Space to jump
Arrow keys controls the metal beam

GamePad
Left analog stick controls worker
A button to jump
Right analog stick controls the metal beam

Game made in Game Maker Studio 1.4
Music made in sunvox
Sound effects from ChipTone
